div.p: This work was supported by a BBSRC-NERC project grant (BB/G00188X/1) and a BBSRC Research Equipment Initiative grant (REI: BB/F011229/1). We thank Melissa Bateson, Richard Bevan, Ben Brilot, Sue Healy and Jeri Wright for helpful discussion and/or comments on the manuscript, and Michelle Waddle for looking after our birds.
